metaDescription:
Here's our story,

It all began with the frustration of using software that sucks. Prior to starting Keka, our core team was a 100 person business that needed an easy to use software for managing employees. We looked everywhere and all we found were software that was lousy and hard to use. We felt SME businesses in India deserved something better. Something awesome actually!

Thus emerged Keka!
apiDescription:
Here's our story,

It all began with the frustration of using software that sucks. Prior to starting Keka, our core team was a 100 person business that needed an easy to use software for managing employees. We looked everywhere and all we found were software that was lousy and hard to use. We felt SME businesses in India deserved something better. Something awesome actually!

Thus emerged Keka!

parameters.name: employeeIds
parameters.description: Comma separated list of one or more Employee ids you'd like to filter on.

parameters.name: employeeNumbers
parameters.description: Comma separated list of one or more Employee numbers you'd like to filter on.

parameters.name: employmentStatus
parameters.description: Comma separated list of one or more Employment Status you'd like to filter on, allowed values are Working, Relieved.

parameters.name: inProbation
parameters.description: Fetches employees who are in probation. The allowed value is true or false.

parameters.name: inNoticePeriod
parameters.description: Fetches employees who are in notice period. The allowed value is true or false.

parameters.name: lastModified

repositoryDescription: Keka: Born from the frustration of poor software, Keka offers user-friendly employee management for Indian SMEs. Keka HR's {language} SDK generated by Konfig (https://konfigthis.com/).
